org.apache.ambari.server.security

Class AbstractSecurityHeaderFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.security.AbstractSecurityHeaderFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmbariServerSecurityHeaderFilter, AmbariViewsSecurityHeaderFilter

    public abstract class AbstractSecurityHeaderFilter
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    AbstractSecurityHeaderFilter is an abstract class used to help add security-related headers to HTTP responses.

    This class is to be implemented to set the values for the following headers:

    1. Strict-Transport-Security
    2. X-Frame-Options
    3. X-XSS-Protection

    If the value for a particular header item is empty (or null) that header will not be added to the set of response headers.

        protected abstract boolean checkPrerequisites(javax.servlet.ServletRequest servletRequest)
